entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
